items.sentence: Have you finished packing your suitcase for your trip to Australia?
Tom will change his tune when he finds out what's in store for him.
Tom wondered what his life would've been like if he'd married Mary.
None of this would've been necessary if we'd followed Tom's advice.
What are little girls made of? Sugar and spice and everything nice.
As a courtesy, Tom ran the first draft of his speech past his boss.
Tom had to wait a long time in the hospital before he was examined.
It seems the only time that Tom isn't eating is when he's sleeping.
Tom could've survived if the ambulance had arrived a little sooner.
All that is allowed to Jupiter is not necessarily allowed to an ox.
